languages.text: "Тебе надо было едва не замерзнуть насмерть, чтобы сказать это, да?"

traits.locale_text: "Тебе надо было едва не замерзнуть насмерть, чтобы сказать это, да?"

languages.text: "It took you almost freezing to death to drag the words out of you, did it?"
languages.original_text: "Тебе надо было едва не замерзнуть насмерть, чтобы сказать это, да?"

traits.locale_text: "It took you almost freezing to death to drag the words out of you, did it?"
"It took you almost freezing to death to drag the words out of you, did it?"
"It took you almost freezing to death to drag the words out of you, did it?"
"It took you almost freezing to death to drag the words out of you, did it?"

languages.text: “得把你逼到差点冻死的份上，才能让你把这些话说出来，对不对？”
languages.original_text: "It took you almost freezing to death to drag the words out of you, did it?"

traits.locale_text: “得把你逼到差点冻死的份上，才能让你把这些话说出来，对不对？”

languages.text: «¿Y de verdad tenía que estar a punto de morir congelado para decírmelo?».
languages.original_text: "It took you almost freezing to death to drag the words out of you, did it?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y de verdad tenía que estar a punto de morir congelado para decírmelo?».

languages.text: 「ほとんど凍え死にそうになりながら、言葉を引き出したんだろう？」
languages.original_text: "It took you almost freezing to death to drag the words out of you, did it?"

traits.locale_text: 「ほとんど凍え死にそうになりながら、言葉を引き出したんだろう？」

languages.text: « Il aura donc fallu que vous soyez à moitié mort de froid pour me l'avouer. »
languages.original_text: "It took you almost freezing to death to drag the words out of you, did it?"

traits.locale_text: « Il aura donc fallu que vous soyez à moitié mort de froid pour me l'avouer. »

languages.text: "Ihr musstest fast erfrieren und sterben, um diese Worte auszusprechen, oder?"
languages.original_text: "It took you almost freezing to death to drag the words out of you, did it?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr musstest fast erfrieren und sterben, um diese Worte auszusprechen, oder?"

languages.text: "Dudaklarından kelimelerin dökülmesi için donarak ölümle burun buruna gelmen gerekiyordu, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "It took you almost freezing to death to drag the words out of you, did it?"
